results.title: Much ado about nut things: problem solving, estimation
results.brief_description: An animated film introducing the concept of estimation and suggests ways to use it in problem solving. Also illustrates the use of the calculator in estimating solutions to problems. Suitable for lower secondary level.

results.title: Much Ado about Nothing
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “BBC Television Shakespeare Series”.
A comedy with two main plots. One concerns the love affair between Beatrice and Benedict, the other deals with the conspiracy against Claudio who is engaged to Beatrice’s gentle cousin, Hero. Don John, who hates Claudio stages a pretended assignation between Borachio, one of his followers, and Margaret, Hero’s maid, who is garbed as her mistress. Claudio, who witnesses the scene and suspects Hero’s virtue, rejects his bride at the altar, but the matter is finally cleared up, with the help of the good Friar Francis.

results.title: MSX Sony ‘Hit Bit’ HB-75B game console and accessories
results.material_description: Video games console with game controllers. Does not include computer monitor. Comes in box with manuals and several magazine advertisements for the unit. Object display only and not functioning
results.brief_description: MSX Sony ‘Hit Bit’ HB-75B video games console. Black computer unit includes keyboard with overlay and adhesive label sheet. Also included are MSX-Basic Reference Chart, Operating Instructions, Programming Reference Manual, Introduction to MSX-Basic, ‘Match Maker’ advertising flyers, aerial/TV/Computer cable and original packaging box.

results.title: Mstislav Rostropovich: Dvorak Cello Concerto. Saint-Saens Concerto No. 1
results.brief_description: Recorded at the Henry Wood Hall in London, internationally acclaimed virtuoso cellist, Mstislav Rostropovich, gives an exquisite performance of two classic concertos with the London Philharmonic Orchestra conducted by Carlo Maria Giulini. This is a German/UK co-production.

results.title: Ms. Reiko Hitomi, Tokyo
results.creator_credit: Sachiko Kimura, Hiroyuki Kurita, Gian Manara, Nihon Hoso Kyokai, Australia. Special Broadcasting Service and Asian Broadcasting Union
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “A Day in the Life of a Woman”.
Reiko Hitomi is a thirtyish, divorced, single parent who works as an aerobics instructor in Tokyo. The program looks at her decidedly untraditional life, her hopes and dreams as she prepares for an aerobics examination which will give her the essential qualifications to pursue her goal of running her own gym. Introduced by Franca Arena.

results.title: Mrs Ryan's drama class
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Cecily Burwash, Tom Daly and Michael Rubbo
results.brief_description: An experiment in free-wheeling dramatic expression for a class of 8-12 year olds. Under the direction of their teacher, Mrs. Ryan, they invent their own dramas progressing in skill and confidence to the point where they stage their own play for the rest of the school.

results.title: Mrs Reynolds needs a nurse
results.creator_credit: Robert Anderson Associates and Robert Anderson
results.brief_description: Recreates an actual case history of a long-term patient who is demanding and difficult to handle. Once the staff examine their attitudes toward Mrs Reynolds and the reasons behind her behaviour, the nursing time required drops. Explores some of the fundamentals of professional nursing.

results.title: Mrs Peabody's beach
results.creator_credit: Dave Bell Associates, Walt Disney Educational Materials, John Cosgrove, Jim Thompson and Wayne Threm
results.brief_description: This film depicts a situation in which a teenager and an elderly woman turn her deserted beach into a profitable business. Covers the laws of supply and demand, capital investment and depreciation, diminishing returns, and other aspects of basic economics. Suitable for upper secondary level.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dave Bell Associates, Walt Disney Educational Materials, John Cosgrove, Jim Thompson and Wayne Threm
